```py
>>> df.groupby('A').agg(lambda x: sum(x) + 2)
 B          C
A
1       5       2.590715
2       9       2.704907 
```

```py
>>> df.groupby('A').agg({'B': ['min', 'max'], 'C': 'sum'})
 B             C
 min max       sum
A
1   1   2  0.590715
2   3   4  0.704907 
```

```py
>>> df.groupby("A").agg(
...     b_min=pd.NamedAgg(column="B", aggfunc="min"),
...     c_sum=pd.NamedAgg(column="C", aggfunc="sum")
... )
 b_min     c_sum
A
1      1  0.590715
2      3  0.704907 
```
